item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Mark Klein, AT&T whistleblower who revealed NSA mass spying, has died (879 points | 195 comments)
2. My teen years: The transputer operating system (74 points | 4 comments)
3. Gemini Robotics (680 points | 401 comments)
4. Show HN: Time Portal – Get dropped into history, guess where you landed (251 points | 138 comments)
5. Practical UX for startups surviving without a designer (159 points | 46 comments)
6. The DuckDB Local UI (671 points | 149 comments)
7. Iconography of the PuTTY tools (233 points | 56 comments)
8. Switching from Pyenv to Uv (206 points | 113 comments)
9. xlskubectl – a spreadsheet to control your Kubernetes cluster (54 points | 23 comments)
10. A GS-Cache Inference Framework for Large-Scale Gaussian Splatting Models (10 points | discuss)
11. Tell Mozilla: it's time to ditch Google (282 points | 300 comments)
12. The city that forgot itself (8 points | 1 comment)
13. Three Implementation Models for Scheme (1987) [pdf] (22 points | 1 comment)
14. The Night Watch (2013) [pdf] (101 points | 19 comments)
15. Reverse engineering OpenAI code execution to make it run C and JavaScript (213 points | 55 comments)
16. Shenmue (1999) reverse engineering reveals possible sun position oversight (130 points | 49 comments)
17. Peer-to-peer file transfers in the browser (442 points | 209 comments)
18. The Future Is Niri (328 points | 171 comments)
19. The cultural divide between mathematics and AI (187 points | 117 comments)
20. 'Uber for nurses' exposes 86K+ medical records, PII via open S3 bucket (182 points | 109 comments)
21. The insecurity of telecom stacks in the wake of Salt Typhoon (275 points | 174 comments)
22. Gemma 3 Technical Report [pdf] (420 points | 221 comments)
23. Zinc, a systems programming language prototype (104 points | 33 comments)
24. I use Cursor daily - here's how I avoid the garbage parts (170 points | 177 comments)
25. Apple has locked me in the same cage Microsoft's built for Windows 10 users (145 points | 161 comments)
26. I stopped everything and started writing C again (285 points | 290 comments)
27. I Built a Mechanical Calculator [video] (69 points | 20 comments)
28. My stupid noise journey (2023) (116 points | 136 comments)
29. Open-UI: Maintain an open standard for UI and promote its adherence and adoption (295 points | 94 comments)
30. Constant-Time Code: The Pessimist Case [pdf] (76 points | 62 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, March 13, 2025 at 6:25 AM UTC
